html:
January 28, 2025 3:00 PM

Soneium Conquest is a way on onboard people to Sony's blockchain.

Image Credit: Sony Block Labs

Sony Block Solutions Labs is launching Soneium Conquest as a way to onboard creators, developers, and newcomers to its Soneium blockchain.

Through a mix of learning, gamification, and exploration, Soneium Conquest invites creators, developers, blockchain enthusiasts, and complete newcomers to dive into the Soneium ecosystem and experience how Web3 can enhance digital connections.

Sony Block Solutions Labs is a Sony Group company established in Singapore in 2023 to construct an innovative network infrastructure using blockchain technology. Soneium Conquest is an immersive four-week deep-dive campaign designed to familiarize the community and onboard newcomers to its recently unveiled blockchain.

Hosted on Galxe, Soneium Conquest will offer something for everyone through a mix of learning, fun challenges, and meaningful engagement, focusing entirely on exploring and learning. The campaign will feature multiple projects weekly, spotlighting a mix of native platforms and multichain protocols, ensuring that participants can explore various use cases and innovations with this diverse lineup.

For four weeks, Soneium Conquest participants will get to the core of the blockchain’s ecosystem, discovering something new at every step. Each week will be dedicated to a fresh new theme, such as NFTs, SocialFi, Consumer Applications, and Gaming, giving the community a chance to learn the basics of bridging and smooth blockchain interactions, explore Soneium ecosystem applications that are changing the way we connect online, and more.

Each of these themed weeks will also be underpinned by tailored educational tasks, including on-chain transactions, social activities, and community-driven challenges. The gaming angle for Soneium Conquest comes through its dedicated exploration of gaming applications during Week 3 (Joy) and Week 4 (Immersion).

Week 1: Creativity — Participants will be able to explore how Soneium empowers creators, transforming ideas into impactful on-chain experiences.
Week 2: Connection — This will be all about discovering how platforms within the ecosystem enhance community, communication, and collaboration in the digital age.
Week 3: Joy — Immersive, exciting, and fun experiences in the world of blockchain gaming, redefining entertainment for the Web3 era.
Week 4: Immersion — A deep dive into gaming applications and innovative ways Web3 technology can enhance user engagement.

The Soneium Conquest was designed from the ground up as a journey of real hands-on experiences, showcasing how Web3 can empower creators, fans, and developers alike to push boundaries and explore new opportunities. By introducing tailored educational tasks and hands-on challenges during these weeks, Soneium Conquest provides a practical glimpse into how blockchain gaming works, engaging developers, creators, and gamers in reimagining the future of interactive entertainment

Soneium is an Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain developed by Sony Block Solutions Labs. It’s a versatile general-purpose blockchain platform that aims to evoke emotion, empower creativity, and realize the open internet that transcends boundaries.
